article_title: How to Lower U.S. Living Standards
article_text:
California Gov. Jerry Brown has a vision: When it comes to greenhouse-gas emissions, he wants his fellow Californians to emulate North Koreans. Meanwhile, many of Mr. Brown’s fellow Democrats—including President Obama, Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders—will settle for putting Americans on a par with residents of Mexico.

That’s the essence of the climate-change agenda of America’s most prominent Democrats. They have pledged to cut...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Robert Bryce writes that the drastic ‘80 by 50’ goal on carbon dioxide emissions would reduce the energy use of Californians to that of North Koreans today and lower U.S. living standards everywhere.
twitter.title: How to Lower U.S. Living Standards

image.alt: How to Lower U.S. Living Standards
